description: Describes which data sources are enabled for the member account's detector. There might be regional differences because some data sources might not be available in all the Amazon Web Services Regions where GuardDuty is presently supported. For more information, see Regions and endpoints.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The detector ID for the administrator account. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: AccountIds
parameters.description: A list of member account IDs. (string) ---

nested_items.name: MemberDataSourceConfigurations
nested_items.description: An object that describes which data sources are enabled for a member account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID for the member account.

nested_items.name: DataSources
nested_items.description: Contains information on the status of data sources for the account.

nested_items.name: CloudTrail
nested_items.description: An object that contains information on the status of CloudTrail as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes whether CloudTrail is enabled as a data source for the detector.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Denotes whether DNS logs is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Denotes whether VPC flow logs is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that describes whether S3 data event logs are automatically enabled for new members of the organization.

nested_items.name: Kubernetes
nested_items.description: An object that contains information on the status of all Kubernetes data sources.

nested_items.name: AuditLogs
nested_items.description: Describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: MalwareProtection
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of Malware Protection data sources.

nested_items.name: ScanEc2InstanceWithFindings
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of Malware Protection for EC2 instances with findings.

nested_items.name: EbsVolumes
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of scanning EBS volumes as a data source.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes whether scanning EBS volumes is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: Specifies the reason why scanning EBS volumes (Malware Protection) was not enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The GuardDuty Malware Protection service role.

nested_items.name: Features
nested_items.description: Contains information about the status of the features for the member account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of the feature that is enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the feature that is enabled for the detector.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the feature object was updated.

nested_items.name: AdditionalConfiguration
nested_items.description: Indicates the additional configuration of the feature that is configured for the member account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of the additional configuration that is set for the member account.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the additional configuration that is set for the member account.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the additional configuration was set for the member account. This is in UTC format.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedAccounts
nested_items.description: A list of member account IDs that were unable to be processed along with an explanation for why they were not processed.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: A reason why the account hasn't been processed.
